meanings.definition: The action or process of providing someone with an official document attesting to a status or level of achievement.
meanings.sent1: Receiving a certification can open up new job opportunities.
meanings.sent2: She proudly displayed her certification on the wall.
meanings.sent3: After receiving his certification, he felt like a champion.
meanings.sent4: Her certification was like a golden ticket to success.
meanings.sent5: The certification gleamed with promise and accomplishment.

meanings.definition: The act of certifying or the state of being certified.
meanings.sent1: The certification process involves thorough evaluation.
meanings.sent2: His certification brought him a sense of pride.
meanings.sent3: The certification ceremony felt like a grand celebration.
meanings.sent4: In the world of certifications, he was a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The certification symbolized his hard work paying off.

meanings.definition: A document attesting to the truth of certain stated facts.
meanings.sent1: She presented her certification as proof of completion.
meanings.sent2: The certification confirmed the accuracy of the data.
meanings.sent3: His certification was like a truth serum for the project.
meanings.sent4: The certification stood as a beacon of honesty in the report.
meanings.sent5: With the certification in hand, there was no room for doubt.
